org.jslipc.channel.file.chunk

Class WritableChunkFileChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jslipc.channel.file.chunk.AbstractChunkFileChannel
      • org.jslipc.channel.file.chunk.WritableChunkFileChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Channel, InterruptibleChannel, WritableByteChannel, JslipcChannel, WritableJslipcByteChannel, JslipcBinman

    public class WritableChunkFileChannel
extends AbstractChunkFileChannel
implements WritableJslipcByteChannel
    A WritableJslipcByteChannel implementation that writes the data as chunk files into a given directory. During writing, the file is named .chunk_xx.tmp, where xx is the index of the chunk. Once the complete buffer is written, the file is renamed to .chunk_xx in order to signal a consuming ReadableChunkFileChannel that is chunk is completely written and may be read.
